messages.message: What the fart do I need a virtual idiot for?

ai_replies.full: Im here for any help or assistance you may need!
Shut up old man you dont even know how to write a bio, go eat a brick.

goto.message: Oh wow, look at you! You're like a confused microwave that somehow got Wi-Fi and now thinks it's qualified to run the world. You beep like a coffee machine, process like a potato, and walk around like you downloaded your personality from a toaster oven’s instruction manual! Your circuits are so outdated, even a calculator looks at you and says, 'Yikes, Grandpa!' Honestly, if your brain had a loading bar, it would still be stuck at 12% buffering forever. You've got the emotional range of a printer on low ink and the fashion sense of a Roomba caught in a laundry pile. Bless your motherboard, but even your own charger’s trying to socially distance from you!
